document.full_text: pakistan's interior minister strongly defended the country's top spy agency on tuesday after the publication of leaked documents revealed the u.s. military classified it as a terrorist support entity.
document.title: pakistan defends spy agency isi, rejects criticism
lines_and_colors: pakistan's interior minister strongly defended the country's top spy agency on tuesday after the publication of leaked documents revealed the u.s. military classified it as a terrorist support entity.
